reviewText: My toddler is a Little Einsteins fanatic. He loved this one with the fire truck
Great service, my son loves this DVD and we have watched it several times now!

This DVD is wonderful.  My grandson loves it and I love watching it with him. The music is fabulous and the story is easy to follow.  I HIGHLY recommend this DVD for all toddlers.  Wonderful, cannot wait for the next new release.

This disc contains 4 episodes of Little Einsteins.  One episode is new and the other three are from the Playhouse Disney broadcasts.  The episodes included on this disc are:

Fire Truck Rocket
Melody the Music Pet
Carmine's Big Race
Mr. Penguin's Ice Cream Adventure

All episodes are ~22 minutes in length and are present in 4:3 Full Frame Format.
Our grandson loves these.
Bough for Easter for our grandson.  He love Little Einstins.
Our 2 year old GN LOVES these. I like that they're interactive. We have family fun with them.
My kids love the little Einsteins adventures.
gave as a gift
My grandson loves it.
grand daughter loves little Einsteins and wanted the same DVD at my house which I am her Mimi and she wanted the same at Grammies house thank you
Great!
Good show and not too annoying
Leo is enjoying the whole set of dvd we sent him.
My sons favorite episode. It has four total episodes and some games. Perfect for my soon to be three year old.
Awesome price for such a great movie! Very impressed

I haven't met a Little Einsteins episode yet that my son doesn't like, however I'm not sure why, but we are unable to get this dvd to play in our player.  All we get is a blank gray screen so I am sending them back.  Amazon sent us a replacement but neither one would work.  We have bought several of these Little Einsteins dvds from Amazon and they all work great except this one.  I really don't know why.  I'm bummed really, as my son just loves The Little Einsteins.
My son loves Little Einsteins and fire trucks so I was excited when I found this one! he has watched it over and over
Fun and educational
Purchased for my 3 yr old grandchild who loves the Little Einsteins!
My son loves this!
The best adventures in one disc. Mission completion
Came very quickly exactly what we wanted!
My son really enjoys Little Einsteins. Especially this one.
Kids book
Wonderful adventures that enraptured both my 3 and 2 year old boys
Awesome video for my son.
goood
We are a huge fan of little einsteins in general. My son loves this movie and watches it during short car rides.
Came as expected and my son loves it.
Great product. ..... exactly as described

What's not to like when you have smart children, racing rockets, and good music??  My 2 1/2 year old loves this and previously showed limited interest in music. Now he pretends to play instruments and dances!
My DVD arrived early and plays  great. My grand loves it.
Plays in great condition my son loves it
Lots of fun to watch many times with my grandson.
Amazon is the only place that I buy DVD's. It is the best deal, the best price, and you do no have to waste gas driving around to see if the DVD is in stock anywhere else.
I am so glad that my preschool grandson is being introduced to art and music and he enjoys these cartoons very much.
My son loves little existing and this is his favorite little Einstein movie by far! Glad I purchased when  I did.
It is a DVD so if your kids love the Little Einsteins, like my son - this will be a great purchase

My 2 year old loves Little Einsteins. And she loves firetrucks (her dad's fault). So this was the BEST buy for her. I accidentally had it shipped to my future in-law's house, which is totally my fault, not that of the sellers.
This actually went to my great granddaughter who loves any kind of vehicle and the Little Einsteins.  It was a hit.

Another little einsteins DVD bought  through amazon that isn't compatible with most DVD players.  The disks should be tested more before sold.  It's seems to be just little einsteins disks that are being sold with this issue...from my experience so far!
My daughter loves Little Einsteins and I'm so glad she does. They're super cute little learning shows. And with each show they have a featured musician and artist so she learns from them.
My class really enjoyed this video it goes really well with our Community helpers and Fire Prevention Lesson.  the music and story line are great. thanks

I love it
Its educational and my son loves it
He watches it all the time and he has like 4 other movies of little Einstein
My grandchild love the movie...he watches it every day.....the little einsteins is a good clean cartoon for children to watch.

My daughter (6yrs) know the theme song by heart and my twin boys love the adventures. I even catch one of the boys humming a classical tune! I love what Little Einstein teaches. Its not your typical mindless cartoon.
Any video with Rocket-my son loves!  I like when videos have short segments-like the tv shows-perfect for not letting him watch too much tv.
The description looks great but since it was a gift for my greatgrandson in the Philippines, I don't know anything more about it.
At 3 yrs old, my grandson has been a "Little Einsteins" fan and this was one he did not have in his collection. So I got it for him. I'm sure he has enjoyed it many times over!
My 2 year old loves Little Einsteins....the next generation Baby Einsteins.  The fire truck episode is a total bonus!  Hur-rah!
Got this for my 3 year old and she learns and it kept her attention, even after multiple viewings. My 9 year old puts up with it too, which helps keep the peace.
This is a cute movie that teaches children as all the Little Einsteins books and movies do.  It has been watched many times.
My granddaughter loves the Little Einsteins, and this one did not disappoint.  The DVD works fine, and she watches it over and over.
Everything was as described and item was shipped fast. My son loves this and I will purchase again in the future.
My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves this DVD. It keeps him entertained. I also bought another Little Einsteins title in this series.
Fire Truck Rocket is our second favorite Little Einsteins movie, after Little Red Train. We love it, very fun and educational
My soon to 3 year old son really likes Little Einsteins, especially this one since the rocket turns into a firetruck. Cute stories and they learn too.

grandson loves little einsteins characters and stories. This one
was no exception! The stories are positive in content. These
little stories are healthy learning sessions.
If I buy one I end up buying two for my house and my grandson house. Great way to learn

We are new 'Little Einsteins' converts. What a nice little show, with little art and music learning points in each one. My boys absolutely love them, even my 2 year old (all he cares about is trucks, trains, and cars and won't look up otherwise)will sit an watch it and sing the songs afterwards. This one is especially popular in our house. The volcano in one episode scares my older child slightly, but more of an adventure scene than a scary scene. A+!!!

This movie is a favorite for my 3 yr. old son. He enjoys hummimg along with the melodies and answers Little Einsteins questions. Fire Truck Rocket is one of his favorites among all the shows. Great buy and worth the money.
This is a good dvd but the first one is much better.  My son enjoy it since he loves the rocket ship

My toddler loved the Baby Einstein's and so I continued on with the Little Einstein's.  I wish they were real life pictures instead of cartoons but the music part is great.  My 2 year old loves the Car and train ones.  They are a big hit at our house:).
This was a must have after my 2yr old has requested watching this one over and over..  We kept renting from netflix and had to order and own this one
Bought set of Little Einstein DVDs for my 3 year old niece who is bilingual in both English and Mandarin Chinese. She absolutely loves the entire 3 DVD set.
good story but the first story art work scared my daughter and we had to skip it several times before she could watch it it is a good story

My son loves L.E. and two of his all time favorite episodes are on this DVD:  fire engine rocket and carmines big race.  This DVD was worth every penny since now we don't have to worry about accidentally deleting those episodes from our DVR!  :-)
My Son loves this video.  Little Einsteins has always been his favorite but this one is one of the best.  His favorite is Carmine the musical race car.
My 4 year old daughter loves the Little Einsteins!  You can't go wrong with adding another movie to her collection.

My son just turned 2 and he LOVES Little Einsteins! He wants to watch them everyday. Right now, he only sits through Little Einstein movies and Monsters, Inc., everything else he looses interest in after a few minutes. I am looking into buying more now, as we have a 15 hour flight ahead....It will keep him entertained for hours!
My grandson is 2 1/2 - very into fire trucks.  He was thrilled with this CD.  My daughter-in-law tells me he wants to watch it over and over again.
Kids love all of the Little Einstein. This is one they ask for specifically!!!
I bought this DVD for my 3 grandchildren.  They absolutely love it.  As soon as it is over they want to re-watch it again.
3 year old grandson loves this! Watches it over and over.
So many previews in the begining.
Love Little Einstein- just a great way of introducing classical music and composers
Perfect for my son

My kid will not stop watching this. I have watched this DVD about 3500 times. I am at the moment that I can probably tell you every dialogue in the DVD. Definitively worth the money since he is glued to the tv instead of climbing furniture and hurting himself. If you need to distract your little monkey, I totally recommend it. They use a little bit of music and art styles in every episode that I hope some of it is being absorbed by my child.

If you need to cook, or clean, or just need 15-20 mins to yourself, pop the DVD in and watch the children get glued to the TV.

We are a Little Einsteins family and have every DVD and all the books etc. We love this show!! This was the last DVD to complete our collection. Well, in the first episode, Firetruck Rocket, the feautred artwork is a Japanese Shadow puppet (or as my son calls it a "puppet giant") While it's a beautiful work of art for an adult to comprehend,  it is frightening for a toddler!!! It's a strange looking image and feautred in a scary way. This is actually the very first time our 3 year old has been spooked by something so much. It's so unfortunate since they incorporate a cool firetruck that really catches the kids attention. Just disappointed with this one.
Love Little Einsteins!
HE LOVES IT!!!!
Great thanks.
Bought this for my daughter and she watched it every night for numerous months...  educational
